body:
according with [dfc](http://dave.cheney.net/2013/06/14/you-dont-need-to-set-goroot-really) 

> These binaries have a $GOROOT value of /usr/local/go and recommend you unpack them into that location. 

i always use the archive for other locations nor pkg  because it works. (for stable releases i use [this](https://github.com/geosoft1/tools) project).
